data.title: Recent Hollywood Movie Premieres
data.text:
Seeing Stars: Where the Stars Meet the Public

Recent Hollywood Movie Premieres - 2007

(For a comprehensive list of upcoming celebrity events, just click here.)

Past ceremonies on the Hollywood Walk of Fame

Past Footprint ceremonies at Grauman's Chinese Theatre

"Spider-Man 3"

for those who have asked: there will be no

West Coast premiere of Spider-Man 3

The world premiere will be held in Tokyo, Japan on 4/16/07.

The U.S. premiere will be held in Queens, New York on 4/30/07,

at the UA Kaufman Astoria 14 in downtown Astoria,

as part of the Tribeca Film Festival.

For more info, go to http://spider-manweeknyc.com
